short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A professional-grade unit converter with multiple categories like Mass, Volume, Speed, Data, Temperature, and Time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Full Description:
Introducing Professional Unit Converter, the ultimate tool for anyone needing quick and accurate unit conversions! This easy-to-use extension supports a wide range of units across multiple categories:

Mass: Convert between kilograms, pounds, grams, ounces, and more.
Volume: Quickly switch between liters, gallons, milliliters, and other volume units.
Data: Convert bytes to kilobytes, megabytes to gigabytes, and much more for all your digital storage needs.
Speed: Convert between kilometers per hour, miles per hour, meters per second, and more.
Temperature: Switch between Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin in a snap.
Time: Convert seconds, minutes, hours, and days with precision.
Key Features:

Comprehensive Conversion: Over 30+ unit conversions across 6 key categories.
Intuitive Design: Clean, modern interface that's easy to navigate.
Fast & Accurate: Real-time conversions with results displayed instantly.
Expandable Options: Includes a "More Options" section with additional features and a Donate button for supporting further development.
Lightweight & Responsive: Optimized for speed and performance.
Whether you're a student, professional, or just someone in need of quick unit conversions, Professional Unit Converter is the perfect tool for you. Install now and make conversions a breeze!

Feedback & Support:
If you have any questions, suggestions, or feedback, feel free to reach out. Your support helps us improve and add new features!
